jigl.image
Class BinaryImage

java.lang.Object
  jigl.image.BinaryImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Image
public class BinaryImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Image

BinaryImage is a 2-d array of byte. All the values in a BinaryImage is always eithier a one or a zero.

                   int y,
                   byte[] dat)
Creates a two dimensional BinaryImage with a height and width of x and y repectively

Parameters:
x - width of image
y - height of image
dat - one dimensional array of short. The array is length x*y.

BinaryImage

public BinaryImage(GrayImage img)
Creates a two dimensional BinaryImage from a GrayImage. Any pixel value above 0 is assigned the 1.

BinaryImage

public BinaryImage(RealGrayImage img)
Creates a two dimensional BinaryImage from a RealGrayImage. Any pixel value above 0 is assigned the 1.
